resources.string: Note: some device manufacturers disabled the ability to enable dark mode in their versions of Android, or provide their own toggle
Note: only apps that have been updated by their developers to add a dark theme and follow the system setting will become dark
Warning: on this version of Android, car mode must be enabled in order to activate dark mode. This may cause unintended behavioral changes and a persistent notification icon to appear
Warning: ensure dark mode is disabled before uninstalling this app or upgrading to a new version of Android
